name: pomodoro
description: Pomodoro time managment tool build with electron :tomato:

releases.name: v.2.0.1
releases.body:
- Add retina icons
- Increase performance
- Universal binary for Windows

releases.name: v.2.0
releases.body:
**TLDR:** The small redesign, a lot of fixes and improvements.
- Using photon theme instead of bootstrap
- Add hint about shortcut to settings
- Add ability to trigger checkboxes by clicking on text labels
- Update dependencies
- Change icon for windows

releases.name: Fix for windows
releases.body: Includes small but important fix of bug that produces error on exit #14

releases.name: v.1.4
releases.body:
- New buttons
- "Show time in menubar" configuration in settings
- Performance improvments

releases.name: v.1.3.2
releases.body:
- Fix timer color on relax mode
- Fix timer progress

releases.name: v.1.3
releases.body:
- More informative pause mode
- Fix startup path for Windows
- Update sliders(display value dynamically)
- Fix exit from application on Windows

- Add timer to menu bar
- Add launch on startup feature
- New option in settings that allow or disable launch on startup
- Fix icon for Windows
- Performance improvements

This release have few minor fixes and improvements:
- Fixed spinner progress for relax time #4
- Add pomodoro counter #1
- Add big break(after 4 pomodoro) and add setting for big break length
- Start/pause shortcut(Ctrl+Alt+S) #6

releases.name: Initial release
releases.body:
Manage your time with minimalist timer based on [pomodoro technique](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pomodoro_Technique)
- Alerts
- Customize work/relax time
- Nice spinner provided by kottenator
- Minimalistic design
